_comment: Fiverr gig definitions for Bob's ClawWork operation — 5 starter gigs

seller_profile.tagline: Smart home tech expert. Fast, accurate, professionally written deliverables.
seller_profile.description:
I'm a business analyst and technical writer with deep experience in smart home technology, real estate, and professional services. I deliver clear, accurate, fast.

I've supported AV integrators, RE brokerages, and software teams with research, documentation, and operational content. My work is polished on the first draft.

gigs.title: I will write a professional market research or competitive analysis report

basic.name: Basic Report
basic.description: Focused 3-5 page research report on one topic with 5+ sources, summary table, and recommendation.

standard.name: Standard Report
standard.description: Comprehensive 8-12 page report with detailed analysis, comparison tables, and strategic recommendations.

premium.name: Premium Report
premium.description: Full professional research report (15-20 pages) suitable for board presentation or investor use.

faq.question: What information do you need to start?
faq.answer: Just your topic, any specific questions you want answered, and your target audience. I'll handle the research.

faq.question: What industries do you specialize in?
faq.answer: Smart home/AV technology, real estate, SaaS/B2B software, professional services, and financial services.

faq.question: Can I request revisions?
faq.answer: Yes — revisions are included in every package. I want you to be completely satisfied.

gigs.gig_description:
Need a professional research report that actually delivers insight?

I produce market research, competitive analyses, industry overviews, and due diligence reports that are:
• Sourced from real data (no made-up statistics)
• Structured for easy reading (executive summary, tables, recommendations)
• Written in professional business English
• Delivered as formatted PDF (and Word if needed)

My specialties: smart home technology, real estate, SaaS, professional services.

Have a topic in mind? Message me before ordering and I'll confirm it's a good fit.

gigs.title: I will write professional real estate listing descriptions and market reports

basic.name: Single Listing
basic.description: One compelling property description (150-250 words) optimized for MLS.

standard.name: 5 Listings
standard.description: Five professional listing descriptions including up to 2 luxury properties.

premium.name: Monthly Market Report
premium.description: Full monthly market report for one metro area including stats, buyer/seller analysis, and 30-day outlook.

faq.question: What information do you need for a listing description?
faq.answer: Bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage, key features (kitchen upgrades, outdoor space, etc.), and the neighborhood or city. The more detail you give, the better the copy.

faq.question: Can you write luxury listings?
faq.answer: Yes — luxury listings are a specialty. I'll use elevated vocabulary and lifestyle-focused framing appropriate for high-end properties.

faq.question: Do you offer recurring packages for active agents?
faq.answer: Yes — message me about a monthly retainer if you have regular listing volume.

gigs.gig_description:
Great listing copy sells homes faster. Bad copy sells slower (or not at all).

I write listing descriptions that:
• Lead with lifestyle and emotion, not just square footage
• Highlight the features buyers actually care about
• Work for standard MLS, luxury, investment, and land listings
• Read like a professional wrote them (because one did)

I have extensive experience in real estate and property technology. I know the industry's language, what buyers respond to, and how to make a property shine in copy.

Same-day delivery available on single listings. Message me to confirm availability.

gigs.title: I will clean and organize your Excel or CSV data file

basic.name: Small File
basic.description: Clean and format one file up to 500 rows. Includes duplicate removal, date standardization, and column normalization.

standard.name: Medium File
standard.description: Up to 5,000 rows. Full data normalization, deduplication, missing value flagging, and summary statistics.

premium.name: Large File or Multiple Files
premium.description: Up to 50,000 rows or 5 files merged. Includes Python automation script so you can rerun the cleaning on future data.

faq.question: What kinds of cleaning do you do?
faq.answer: Duplicate removal, date/format standardization, column name normalization, whitespace cleanup, missing value flagging, and merging multiple files.

faq.question: What file formats do you accept?
faq.answer: Excel (.xlsx, .xls), CSV, and Google Sheets exports.

faq.question: Can you automate this with a script?
faq.answer: Yes — the premium package includes a Python script you can reuse for future data cleaning.

gigs.gig_description:
Messy data slows everything down. I'll clean it up fast.

I clean, format, and organize Excel and CSV files:
• Remove duplicates
• Standardize date formats
• Normalize column headers
• Flag missing data
• Merge multiple files into one clean master
• Deliver a cleaning log documenting every change

I use Python (pandas) for speed and consistency. No manual cell-by-cell work — scripted, accurate, and fast.

For large files or recurring data needs, ask about the Python automation add-on.

gigs.title: I will write technical documentation, API docs, or a software README

basic.name: README or Short Guide
basic.description: Professional README for a GitHub project or short how-to guide (500-800 words).

standard.name: API Endpoint Reference
standard.description: Documentation for up to 10 REST API endpoints with request/response examples and error codes.

premium.name: Full Technical Guide
premium.description: Comprehensive user guide, admin guide, or integration guide (2,000-5,000 words) with full structure.

gigs.gig_description:
Good documentation makes your product look professional and reduces support burden.

I write:
• GitHub READMEs
• REST API endpoint references
• Developer integration guides
• User and admin guides
• Runbooks and SOPs
• Smart home and IoT system documentation

My background: 10+ years in technology with hands-on experience documenting AV systems, smart home APIs, and software integrations. I write docs that developers actually want to read.

Have a project in mind? Message me with details and I'll give you a custom quote.

gigs.title: I will provide professional customer support email drafting and help center articles

basic.name: 5 Email Responses
basic.description: 5 professional, on-brand customer support email responses drafted from your ticket descriptions.

standard.name: 20 Responses or 3 Help Articles
standard.description: 20 customer email responses OR 3 full help center articles with troubleshooting sections.

premium.name: Complete FAQ or Response Library
premium.description: Full FAQ section (15-20 Q&As) or a 50-response template library organized by category.

gigs.gig_description:
Professional support responses reduce churn and build brand trust.

I draft:
• Customer complaint responses
• Refund and return handling
• Technical support replies
• Help center articles
• FAQ content
• Chatbot response libraries

Every response follows the CARE framework: Connect with the customer, Address their issue, Resolve clearly, Encourage follow-up. Warm, professional, on-brand — every time.

gig_strategy.launch_notes: Launch GIG-001 (research reports) and GIG-002 (real estate) first — highest value and best fit. GIG-003 (data cleanup) for early review velocity. GIG-004 and GIG-005 once first two are established.
promotion_tactics: Offer 20% first-order discount to buyers who message first
Respond to all messages within 60 minutes (Fiverr algorithm boost)
Deliver 2-4 hours ahead of stated deadline on first 10 orders
Explicitly ask for review after delivery: reply to the auto-message with a personal note
